name: SKProductDiscount.PaymentMode
desc: Values representing the payment modes for a product discount.

items.name: case payAsYouGo
items.desc: A constant indicating that the payment mode of a product discount is billed over a single or multiple billing periods.

items.name: case payUpFront
items.desc: A constant indicating that the payment mode of a product discount is paid up front.

items.name: case freeTrial
items.desc: A constant that indicates that the payment mode is a free trial.
